/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, interspersed with trees that add a touch of green to the concrete jungle. Cars of different colors are scattered across the road, indicating a busy time of day. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many cities. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
